description:
## Id
AWSResilienceHub-ChangeLambdaMemorySizeSOP_2020-10-26

## Intent
Change memory size of a Lambda function

## Type
SOP

## Risk
Medium

## Requirements
  * Lambda Function

## Permissions required for AutomationAssumeRole
  * lambda:UpdateFunctionConfiguration

## Cancellation behavior
Fail

## Inputs
### (Required) AutomationAssumeRole
  * type: String
  * description: ARN of the IAM role with permissions listed above

### (Required) LambdaARN
  * type: String
  * description: The ARN of the Lambda function

### (Required) NewMemorySizeValue
  * type: Integer
  * description: The new RAM value in Megabytes  (128 MB — 10,240 MB)

## Details
The document updates memory size of the specified Lambda function and waits for the new configuration to be
succefully applied.

## Steps executed in normal flow
  * RecordStartTime
  * WaitForLabmdaSuccessfulUpdatedStatusBeforeModification
  * UpdateMemorySize
  * WaitForLabmdaSuccessfulUpdatedStatusAfterModification
  * OutputRecoveryTime

## Outputs
### UpdateMemorySize.NewMemorySizeValue
  * type: Integer
  * description: Updated memory size value

### OutputRecoveryTime.RecoveryTime
  * type: Integer
  * description: Execution time in seconds

LambdaARN.description: (Required) The ARN of the Lambda function.

NewMemorySizeValue.description: (Required) The new RAM value in Megabytes  (128 MB — 10,240 MB).

AutomationAssumeRole.description: (Required) The ARN of the role that allows Automation to perform the actions on your behalf.
